when.setEventAttribute: Use the show vpn-sessiondb detail webvpn command for a regular WebVPN user, or the show vpn-sessiondb detail svc command for a WebVPN SVC user on both the active and standby units. Compare the entries and determine whether the same user session record appears on both Secure Firewall Threat Defense devices. Resynchronize the standby unit, if needed, by using the write standby command on the active unit.
